alfredsnippet.snippet:
Journey to the Centre of Uncertainty, R A Lyttleton, Speculations in Science & Technology, Vol. 8, No. 5 p.331

"Logic itself is a kind of trimmed down distillate of reliable established theoretical knowledge, but may be of no help where new realms of thought are required, it may even be a handicap."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Logic
